name: AppLovin tokenized stock (xStock)
description: AppLovin xStock (APPx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. APPx tracks the price of AppLovin Corporation (the underlying). APPx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of AppLovin Corporation, whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. AppLovin is a global mobile technology company that provides businesses with solutions to connect with their target audience, market, monetize, and grow their apps and content.
